# Plot the data from each dataset using a heat map.

```{r}
# Heatmap
cor_matrix <- cor(data[sapply(data, is.numeric)])
heatmap(cor_matrix)

```

```{r echo=TRUE, results='hide'}
# Spatial Map
library(mapview) 
df <- read.csv('costcos-geocoded.csv')
mapview(df, xcol = "Longitude", ycol = "Latitude", crs = 4269, grid = FALSE)

```

```{r}
# Lollipop Plot
library(ggplot2)

ggplot(data, aes(x=Name, y=G)) +
  geom_point() + 
  geom_segment( aes(x=Name, xend=Name, y=0, yend=G)) +
  scale_x_discrete(guide = guide_axis(angle = 90))
```
